Pseudobulk

Source: R/data.R
pseudobulk.Rd

A gene expression matrix after aggregation of the single cell object (pseudobulk).

Usage

pseudobulk

Format

Matrix with genes as rows and samples as columns

Examples

data(pseudobulk)
head(pseudobulk)
#>           Sample_12929 Sample_15467 Sample_13634 Sample_14428 Sample_11817
